main.name: Rishi Raj
main.description: I am a Software Engineer with interest in Web Application development. I love coding in Python, Javascript and have started to be amazed by the power of React.js recently!
main.bio: I've started to work in Full-Stack development and have been loving learning the integration of Front-end and backend. I've experience in various programming languages and database technologies.
main.contactmessage: Please feel free to get in touch with me for any job realted information or if you just like to work in the project with me
